name: presaging
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
presage
to show or suggest that something, often something unpleasant, will happen: But still the economy is not showing signs of any of the excesses that normally presage a recession. Synonyms

betoken old use
bode formal
foreshadow formal
portend formal
prefigure formal
